properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEM_INFO A ( A.MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_PHONE , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_BIRTH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT A.MEM_PWD FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT A.MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_PHONE , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_BIRTH , A.MEM_KIND , A.MEM_STATUS , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_PHONE = ? , A.MEM_ADDRESS = ? , A.MEM_EMAIL = ? WHERE A.MEM_NO = ? AND A.MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.MEM_NO = ? AND A.MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
